title: Playbook Auto-Save (Debounced)
description: Replace the explicit save button in the Playbook editor with debounced auto-save (triggers 1-2s after typing stops). Remove version conflict detection UI since CRDT collaboration (BL-050) handles conflicts natively. Subtle status indicator replaces the save button: "Saving...", "Saved", or "Save failed". Supersedes the old explicit save pattern. Prerequisite for real-time collaboration. Playbook backlog: PB-035.
